channel.title: Services on Cottage Painter
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Cottage Painter

item.title: Exterior Painting
item.description: I offer modern, efficient, correct, large-scale exterior painting. Modern; I use the most modern equipment and tools as the basis of my process. Efficient; my process is effective and practiced. Correct; my process is warranty-valid according to the paint manufacturer. Large-scale; my process can handle any size job on the Bay. Process Estimation Washing Preparation Application Cleanup Estimation All services I provide are offered with a firm, quoted, transparent price.

item.title: Gutter Cleaning
item.description: Using a high-pressure pressure washer, an extension wand, and a special attachment, I am able to wash-out your eavestroughs without ever having to climb a ladder. Fast, efficient, and highly effective. This service is offered at a discounted price to anyone that hires me for exterior painting, since it can be done at the same time as the washing.

item.title: Interior Painting
item.description: I offer modern, efficient, correct, small-scale interior painting. Modern; I use the most modern equipment and tools as the basis of my process. Efficient; my process is effective and practiced. Correct; my process is warranty-valid according to the paint manufacturer. Small-scale; my process can handle small jobs (trim-repaints, bedrooms, …). The Process Estimation Washing Preparation Application Cleanup Estimation All services I provide are offered with a firm, quoted, transparent price.
